overview: A newly-wed couple struggle to have children. They give up their jobs in London and move to the countryside, hoping to fulfil their dreams. Few years later a very special baby is born, one who can turn himself into a piglet!  How will the parents cope with a reality that is nothing short of a miracle?  And what if a terrible fate awaited the kid?
tagline: What if your son could turn himself into a piglet at will? Two young parents find themselves at a crossroad in life.
title: A Piglet's Tale
